Title: #370: The Cost of Leadership with John Eldredge
Description:
If you think leadership is only about C-suite perks and privileges, bestselling author and counselor John Eldredge says you’re in for a serious wake-up call. Leadership is a higher calling, he says, and one that comes with a price tag to match. Luckily, simply acknowledging that fact goes a long way in boosting your resilience and preparing you for what lies ahead. Tune in as John shares an unfiltered look at leadership, as well as some everyday strategies to make the journey all the more worthwhile.
